content: I was discussing this with Micah in DMs when I came across that paper. I'm desperately looking for someone who could interpret it and let me know whether it gives any key to practical witness encryption, thought some people here might know?

content: It's extremely hard for a non-cryptographer to figure out whether the methods outlined in this paper are actually implementable to encrypt non-trivial messages without expending unrealistic computational power
